# typeAutomatic

**Type Property**

An array of pasteboard-item representation types with automatically-determined uniform type identifiers (UTIs).

## Declaration

```swift
class let typeAutomatic: String
```

## Discussion

Use this type in the [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/setItems(_:options:)] method to automatically insert appropriate UTIs for supported types. In iOS 10, supported types are [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSString], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSAttributedString], [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Foundation/NSURL], [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIImage], and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIColor].

## Constants

- **typeListString**: An array of pasteboard-item representation types for string-type uniform type identifiers (UTIs), including the `kUTTypeUTF8PlainText` and `kUTTypeText` types. Related [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard] properties are [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/string] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/strings].
- **typeListURL**: An array of pasteboard-item representation types for URL-type uniform type identifiers (UTIs), including `kUTTypeURL`. Related [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard] properties are [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/url] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/urls].
- **typeListImage**: An array of pasteboard-item representation types for image-type uniform type identifiers (UTIs), including `kUTTypePNG` and `kUTTypeJPEG`. Related [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard] properties are [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/image] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/images].
- **typeListColor**: An array of pasteboard-item representation types for colors. Related [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard] properties are [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/color] and [doc://com.apple.uikit/documentation/UIKit/UIPasteboard/colors].
